Introduction

Halo (Korean: 헤일로; Japanese: ハロー) is a six-member boy group form Hi-Star Entertainment. They made their official debut on June 28, 2014 with the digital single "38°C".

In 2019, the group's contract with Hi-Star Entertainment reached its expiration. Although there was no news of disbandment, Halo remains an inactive group.
